channel.title: Godsword Dismantle Dupe HELP!
channel.description:
How do i fix this dupe people click on the godsword then right click it quick and dismantle...whiich leaves 1 godsword wielding and the shard/hilt in the inventory!
Im using pk planet 317 source

item.title: Godsword Dismantle Dupe HELP!
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Before the switch statement, add;

if (!c.playerHasItem(k)) return;

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Dismantle Dupe HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

teufel:

Maybe this will help. Go into your class 8 in your client and find the ints for your godswrds. The ints for every gs should say dimantle in them. Maybe if you delete th line where it says dismantle it will disable it. Before you do this make a backup of your class 8

Your an idiot, Removing that will only remove the dismantle option, therefore when right clicking it, it will show nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Dismantle Dupe HELP!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

just look for like case 2402 were it says like delete item 2402, thats proably the sgs dismantle, look for the other ids and delete those cases too, i did this, it works, i have pk planet v2 as my base, but its really not pk planet anymore, i added way to much stuff

item.title: Godsword Dismantle Dupe HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Add a condition to that switch statement. So it makes sure the item is still in the inventory when they dismantle it. I can’t help you any further than that.

Ex: (do not add to your code, it won’t compile)

if(itemInInventory) {
    // dismantle code in here
}

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Dismantle Dupe HELP!
item.dc:creator: @KushScape KushScape
item.description:
@KushScape wrote:

public void secondClickItem()
{
int i = inStream.readSignedWordA();
int j = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int k = inStream.readSignedWordA();
int l = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
boolean flag = false;
boolean flag1 = false;
switch(k)
{
case 15040:
deleteItem(15040, 1);
addItem(2587, 1);
addItem(2583, 1);
addItem(2585, 1);
break;
case 15039:
deleteItem(15039, 1);
addItem(2489, 1);
addItem(2495, 1);
addItem(2501, 1);
break;
case 15038:
deleteItem(15038, 1);
addItem(16005, 1);
addItem(16004, 1);
addItem(16003, 1);

addItem(1050, 1);
addItem(1053, 1);
addItem(8100, 1);
addItem(8002, 1);
addItem(1055, 1);
addItem(1057, 1);
addItem(13665, 1);
addItem(1295, 1);

			break;
	case 15037:
			deleteItem(15037, 1);
			addItem(2518, 1);
			addItem(2520, 1);
			addItem(2522, 1);
			addItem(2524, 1);
			addItem(2526, 1);
			break;
	case 15036:

			addItem(4716, 1);
			addItem(4718, 1);
			addItem(4720, 1);
			addItem(4722, 1);
			break;
	case 15035:
			deleteItem(15035, 1);
			addItem(7608, 1);
			addItem(7609, 1);
			addItem(7613, 1);
			addItem(35, 1);
			break;
	case 15034:
			deleteItem(15034, 1);
			addItem(2813, 1);
			addItem(2657, 1);
			addItem(2653, 1);
			addItem(2655, 1);
			addItem(2659, 1);
			break;
	case 15033:
			deleteItem(15033, 1);
			addItem(4319, 1);

	case 15032:
